content: As you head up the stairs of the darkened cave, be sure to keep an eye on the right of the chamber for a long wooden chest that holds **Will** and 2 **Silk**.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Crouching_Tiger_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Crouching Tiger Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Cellar'.
The content is as follows:
As you head up the stairs of the darkened cave, be sure to keep an eye on the right of the chamber for a long wooden chest that holds **Will** and 2 **Silk**.
